title: Strava Helper
name: strava-helper
description: Some tweaks for the Strava website
author: Marcus Jaschen

preferences.name: addKudosButton
preferences.title: Add 'Kudos to all' button
preferences.description: Adds a button which gives kudos to all visible activities

preferences.name: removeClutter
preferences.title: Remove clutter
preferences.description: Removes social media links and premium incentives

preferences.name: addVeloViewerLinks
preferences.title: Add links to VeloViewer
preferences.description: Adds a link to the VeloViewer activity page and to VeloViewer.com

preferences.name: fixateNavBar
preferences.title: Navigation always visible
preferences.description: Pin the main navigation bar to the top, making it always visible

preferences.name: addGlobalHeatMapLink
preferences.title: Add a link to the global heat map
preferences.description: Adds a link to the global heat map in the 'Explore' menu

preferences.name: enableCustomLeaderboardType
preferences.title: Change the default segement leaderboard filter
preferences.description: Changes the segment leaderboard to the filter selected below

preferences.name: autoloadActivities
preferences.title: Automatically load more activities
preferences.description: Load more activities when the bottom of the activity feed is reached

preferences.name: removeConsecutiveAvatarsInFeed
preferences.title: Automatically remove consecutive avatar images
preferences.description: Removes consecutive avatar images from the activity feed if the activities are from the same user

preferences.name: enableAnimations
preferences.title: Enable animations
preferences.description: Enables animations for some actions done by Strava Helper

preferences.name: changeDefaultUploadToFile
preferences.title: Change default upload type
preferences.description: Set file upload as default upload type

preferences.name: firstInstall
preferences.title: Indicator if the add-on was started for the first time
